metadata.dc:author: Mora Santos, M E
Gómez de Tejada Romero, R
González Palomino, A
Pardo Romero, G
Pantoja Hernández, C G
Blasco Huelva, A
Pino Rivero, V
metadata.dc:description: Parathyroid hyperfunction condition has a very diverse and unspecific symptoms and signs. We have performed an anatomopathologic study of 146 parathyroid gland from patients diagnosed from hyperparathyroidism. About a 72.6% of the patients presented a parathyroid adenoma while in the rest 27.4% it was observed principal cells hyperplasia. Up to now we have not registered any cases of parathyroid carcinoma after anatomopathological exam of the removed gland. The mayority of the adenomas (85%) were found on the lower parathyroids and its size varied between 6 mm and 5 cm. In one case an double adenoma was diagnosed and in another two cases the adenoma was located in the superior mediastine.
metadata.dc:title: Morfología de las glándulas paratiroides. Estudio de 146 muestras y revisión de la literatura.
[Morphology of the parathyroid glands. A study of 146 samples and review of the literature].
